content.description:
Use the image below to answer all parts of the question.

Aleksandr Dejneka, “We Shall Mechanize the Donbas,” Soviet Union, 1931

The Donbas is a region of Ukraine known for containing one of Europe’s largest coal deposits. In the 1930s it was part of the Soviet Union.
content.question:
In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.

a) Identify the likely purpose of the poster.

b) Explain one development that led to the initiative shown in the image.

c) Explain one reason that Ukraine would be a particular focus for propaganda such as this image.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
